mapper.select: select sysdate ad sdate, board_num from board
mapper.update: update board set board_reply_seq = board_reply_seq+1 where board_reply_seq > (select board_reply_seq from board where board_num = #{boardNum}) and board_ref = (select board_ref from board where board_num = #{boardNum})
mapper.select: select * from board where BOARD_LEVEL > (select BOARD_LEVEL form board where board_Num=#{board_Num}) and BOARD_REF = (select BOARD_REF form board where board_Num=#{board_Num}) and BOARD_REPLY_SEQ > = (select BOARD_REPLY_SEQ form board where board_Num=#{board_Num}) order by BOARD_REPLY_SEQ asc
